official_title: A bill to amend part B of title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for payment for facility services provided in conjunction with extracorporeal shock wave lithotripsy.

summary.text: Amends part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to cover services furnished by ambulatory surgical centers in connection with extracorporeal shock wave lithotripsy.

titles.title: A bill to amend part B of title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for payment for facility services provided in conjunction with extracorporeal shock wave lithotripsy.
